row.process: ! insert these lines in your script to determine if an error occurred ! ! variables ! &KISS_HOSTNAME# ! ! referentiel VARA.TECHNICAL.TIMER_RETRY ! referentiel VARA.TECHNICAL.IVANTI ! :SET &KISS_HOSTNAME#="W2K16-01" :DEFINE &MY_RC#,string :SET &MAX_ITERATIONS#=GET_VAR(VARA.TECHNICAL.TIMER_RETRY,'INSTALL_IVANTI','1') :SET &TEMPORISATION#=GET_VAR(VARA.TECHNICAL.TIMER_RETRY,'INSTALL_IVANTI','2') :SET &MY_USER#=GET_VAR(VARA.TECHNICAL.IVANTI,'USER','1') :SET &MY_PASSWORD#=GET_VAR(VARA.TECHNICAL.IVANTI,'PASSWORD','1') :SET &MY_SERVEUR_IVANTI#=GET_VAR(VARA.TECHNICAL.IVANTI,'SERVEUR_IVANTI','1') :PSET &MY_RC#=KO :BEGIN_EXT_INT POWERSHELL write-host "* * * * * * * * * *" get-executionpolicy write-host "* * * * * * * * * *" $i=1 $max=&MAX_ITERATIONS# $tempo=&TEMPORISATION# $my_host="&GLOBAL_HOSTNAME#" while ($i -le $max){ Write-Host "wget SOAP IVANTI: &MY_SERVEUR_IVANTI# &MY_USER# &MY_PASSWORD#" Write-Host "$secpasswd = ConvertTo-SecureString "&MY_PASSWORD#" -AsPlainText -Force" Write-Host "$mycreds = New-Object System.Management.Automation.PSCredential ("&MY_USER#", $secpasswd)" Write-Host "$myWS = New-WebServiceProxy -uri http://&MY_SERVEUR_IVANTI#/MBSDKService/MsgSDK.asmx?WSDL -Credential $mycreds" # $myWS.Search..... $RC=$? if ($RC) { :REGISTER_VARIABLE "MY_RC#","OK" break } else { Start-Sleep -s $tempo $i++ } } write-host "* * * * * * * * * *" :END_EXT_INT POWERSHELL

row.post_process: :IF &MY_RC# = "KO" : PRINT KO: INSTALL IVANTI &GLOBAL_HOSTNAME# : PRINT DEBUG &EXIT_KISS_KO# : PSET &EXIT_KISS_KO#="&EXIT_KISS_KO#,INSTALL IVANTI &GLOBAL_HOSTNAME#" : MODIFY_STATE STATUS_TEXT="ECHEC INSTALL IVANTI &GLOBAL_HOSTNAME#" : MODIFY_STATE RETCODE=10 :ELSE : PRINT OK: INSTALL IVANTI &GLOBAL_HOSTNAME# : PSET &EXIT_KISS_OK#="&EXIT_KISS_OK#,INSTALL IVANTI &GLOBAL_HOSTNAME#" :ENDIF
